title: error 004 after crash
body: My client was patching at around 90% then my computer randomly crashed, now when i get on to play i see error 004 u need to restart client but every time i do it just loops back around to the same error 004 message plz help fix this

replies.body:
**Error 004** in the Beta Client usually means that there's an issue with your PC maintaining a solid connection to our servers, likely due to an incompatible setting on your network. I'd like you to confirm your local network settings are fine by working through our [**connection guide**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) to ensure yours aren't causing issues.

Let me know if this worked.
